## Plugin Submission

**Plugin name**: `plugins/___`

### Checklist

- [ ] Plugin directory is under `plugins/` with a descriptive name
- [ ] `.claude-plugin/plugin.json` exists with correct metadata
- [ ] Commands/skills have clear, complete instructions
- [ ] Plugin is added to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json`
- [ ] Tested locally with `claude --plugin-dir ./plugins/my-plugin`
- [ ] No destructive operations without user confirmation
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
